description:
A Tippmixprót mobilapplikációban is elérheted, ahol kényelmesen és gyorsan intézheted fogadásaidat. Töltsd le a HIVATALOS Tippmixpro applikációt és próbáld ki a legújabb funkciókat!
A Tippmixpro széles sportkínálattal, rengeteg fogadási piaccal és kiemelkedő oddsokkal vár téged. Próbáld ki az élő fogadást, ahol az éppen zajló mérkőzésekre, valós időben tudsz fogadást tenni, és akár élő közvetítéssel, azaz stream segítségével is követni tudod a meccsek történéseit.
A hagyományos sportfogadás mellett lehetőséged van még fogadni a v-sport események széles kínálatára is: tippelhetsz virtuális labdarúgásra, kosárlabdára, teniszre, baseballra, krikettre és lóversenyre egyaránt, melyek kapcsán számtalan piac és kimenetel áll rendelkezésedre!
Milyen lehetőségek várnak még rád?
•	Speciális oddsnövelések
Az Oddsrakétával minden nap több, kiemelkedő nyereményszorzóval kínált fogadási lehetőség közül válogathatsz, akár egy, akár több kimenetelre vonatkozóan. A Szuper oddsokkal a nap legnépszerűbb mérkőzéseinek győztesére vonatkozóan fogadhatsz magasabb nyereményszorzóval.
•	Oddspiramis
Az Oddspiramis ajánlatot használva minél több eseményt válogatsz a szelvényedre, annál magasabb értékű százalékkal növelheted meg a fogadásod nyereményszorzójának, ezzel pedig a várható nyereményednek a mértékét!  
•	Promóciók, ingyenes fogadás
A Tippmixprón minden héten exkluzív promóciókkal várunk – ajánlatainkkal bónuszösszeghez, ingyenes fogadási lehetőségekhez is juthatsz! 
•	Korai kifizetés kétgólos előnynél
A Tippmixprón a Korai kifizetés megjelöléssel feltüntetett mérkőzések esetében fogadásod már akkor nyertessé válik, ha az általad győztesnek választott csapat bármikor kétgólos előnybe kerül – függetlenül attól, hogy mi lesz a végeredmény! Mindez elérhető a labdarúgó BL, EL, NB I és a topligák meccseire is!
•	Cash out, automatikus cash out, részleges cash out
A cash out használatával megjátszott fogadásaidat még az esemény vége előtt, saját döntésedre lezárhatod, ezzel pedig biztosíthatod a nyereményedet. A felkínált nyeremény összege függ attól, hogy a megfogadott kimenetel bekövetkezésére éppen mekkora esély van. A Tippmixprón ráadásul automatikus vagy részleges cash out beállítására is lehetőséged van!
•	Fogadáskészítő
A Fogadáskészítő funkció segítségével egyetlen meccsen belül is tudsz kötésben, kötéstiltás nélkül fogadni,  ráadásul ehhez százas nagyságrendben válogathatsz a piacok közül.
•	StatMester
A StatMester által nyújtott tájékoztató jellegű információkkal pontosabb képet kaphatsz a csapatok formájáról, statisztikai mutatóiról.
•	Speciális fogadási kínálat
Unod a túl általános fogadási lehetőségeket? Tippelj speciális lehetőségekre, átigazolásokra, díjátadókra – exkluzív lehetőségekkel várunk! 
•	Személyre szabott funkciók
A Kedvencek menüpont segítségével azonnal elérhetővé válik kedvenc csapatodnak, vagy akár kedvenc teniszeződnek az összes fogadásra kínált eseménye. Kedvenc bajnokságaidat, fogadási piacaidat is rögzítheted, vagy akár egy élőben zajló mérkőzést is, amíg a kínálatban böngészel.
Ha nem akarsz lemaradni a sportfogadás gyorsan fejlődő világáról, a speciális lehetőségekről, akkor töltsd le az appot! Tudjuk, mi a pálya! 
A Tippmixpro mobilalkalmazás a Szerencsejáték Zrt. hivatalos online sportfogadási mobilalkalmazása. Maradjon játék! 18+. A túlzásba vitt szerencsejáték ártalmas, függőséget okozhat!

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.

Darts Scorer App Score Counter 2025 is designed for darts lovers.
With this app you can easily count scores while playing X01 and Cricket darts games with your friends. App calculates all points, statistics and automatically determines the winner. In the application you can choose players, the number of Legs and Sets, the game mode and the number of scores 301, 501. It is also possible to save games and play them later. You don't need to buy a special Scoreboard or scorekeeper, everything is available in your phone. Download and track game results with this easy-to-use and free darts calculator.

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

GasGrip is the ultimate companion app for amateur and semi-professional racing enthusiasts. Whether you're hitting the track for practice or competing in official races, GasGrip helps you track every aspect of your motorsport journey.
TRACK YOUR RACING PERFORMANCE
Record lap times with millisecond precision
Track multiple sessions across different tracks
Monitor improvement over time with detailed statistics
Separate practice sessions from official races
Track weather conditions and track temperatures
CUSTOM TRACK MAPS
Draw your own track layouts using your finger
Save unlimited custom track maps
Mark start/finish lines and pit lanes
Perfect for local tracks or unofficial circuits
COMPREHENSIVE EXPENSE TRACKING
Monitor all car-related expenses in one place
12 expense categories from fuel to modifications
Beautiful charts and breakdowns
Link expenses to specific track sessions
Set budgets and track spending trends
MAINTENANCE REMINDERS
Never miss critical service intervals
Set reminders based on miles or time
Track maintenance history
Link maintenance tasks to expenses
SESSION DETAILS
Record fuel consumption per session
Track tire and brake wear
Document mechanical issues
Add photos and video links
Detailed session notes
ANALYTICS & INSIGHTS
Best lap times across all tracks
Cost per lap analysis
Track vs street driving expenses
Performance trends over time
Session comparison tools
CALENDAR VIEW
Visualize all track days and maintenance
Plan upcoming sessions
See expense timeline
Color-coded event types
MULTI-CAR SUPPORT
Track multiple vehicles separately
Switch between cars easily
Compare costs across vehicles
Individual statistics for each car
Perfect for:
Track day enthusiasts
Time attack racers
Drift competitors
Autocross participants
Amateur racing teams
Car collectors tracking expenses
GasGrip combines powerful racing analytics with comprehensive expense management, giving you complete insight into both your performance and the true cost of your motorsport passion.
Download GasGrip today and take your racing to the next level!

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

developer: Shenzhen United Power Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Target DartCounter is the world’s biggest darts scorer app for keeping track of all your scores. Play x01 games, Cricket, Around the Clock and several other training games.
Play online against your friends or challenge the computer dartbot.
In the x01 games you will hear the voice of MasterCaller Ray Martin who will announce your name and all your scores.

Register or log in and all your games will be saved.
Play with multiple players with a DartCounter account and the whole game will be saved in both accounts.

IN-APP PURCHASES 
The app offers one in-app purchases; "Ultimate Yearly" and "Ultimate Monthly". These are annual  and monthly auto renewable subscription which gives you access to more features and statistics to improve your darts skills.

When you own this subscription you will get the newest gameplays earlier than the users without the subscription. Also, we will keep adding more Ultimate features in the future updates to make the usage easier, more detailed and even more fun!

GENERAL PAYMENT INFORMATION
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


PRICING
The Ultimate Yearly subscription costs $34.99 USD each year, the Ultimate Monthly subscription costs $4.99 USD each year. This will be automatically converted to your own currency by iTunes. For more information about the annual payment or how to cancel auto renewing, read "Payment & Cancellation".


PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

24 hours before the end of each subscription period (one year) you'll automatically be charged the same amount as you've paid for the initial purchase.
After renewing, your subscription will be valid for another year.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes/App Store account settings; 
you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period to avoid being billed for the next cycle. 
-------------------------------------------------
AGREEMENT
https://dartcounter.net/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
https://dartcounter.net/privacy-policy

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob

Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Get ready to take your fut gaming experience to the next level with PACFUT! Our latest season is packed with exciting game modes that will challenge you and help you build the ultimate squad.

• Draft Builder: You can play draft simulator on the PACFUT Draft mode. Practice building the best draft squads by completing Draft Building Challenges. Join the Draft League and compete against other teams

•Open Packs: You can open different types of FUT Packs on the PAC FUT open packs mode. Many different types of packs are provided and many are added on each update and in the lightning rounds.

•Squad Building Challenges: SBC mode allows PAC FUT users to get creative and earn decent rewards. Users have a wide selection of dynamic scenarios to complete including Basic, Advanced, Nation, Club and League Challenges.

•Squad Builder:
•Daily Objectives: This challenges are an easy way to complete your collection. Keep your daily streak alive to earn better rewards. Daily challenges reset after 7 days of completion.

•Weekly Objectives: Complete weekly objectives in-game or in the web & companion app to earn new rewards. Complete draft, pack, SBC and skill battles challenges to earn rewards and boost your collection, the harder the challenge, the better the rewards you’ll receive. 

•Store: Store: Check out the latest FUT Packs and Player Picks updates without having to update the app. Keep up with the latest and player changes.


•Latest Players: Get the latest FUT players updates without needing to update the app.

ShowDown: **NEW** Play against the AI or other players in our newest mode, ShowDown. Get to know your players and plan your game to beat your opponents in One vs One ShowDown.


•Draft Battles: Coming Soon, we are working hard to complete this fun game mode

•Trading: You can now trade players and coins on the market. This can get you the coins you need to buy better players and complete your squad. Players' Favourite.

•Collections: Track all your card collections to according to clubs, nations and card types. This is an easy way to follow your progress

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

DAZN holds the world’s largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights, including:

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

A HORGÁSZ applikáció a Magyar Országos Horgász Szövetség mobil alkalmazása. Az alkalmazásba a horgász regisztrációdhoz használt felhasználó neveddel és jelszóddal tudsz belépni. Amennyiben nem ismered a belépési adataidat, illetve további kérdésed van, fordulj ügyfélszolgálatunkhoz.

A HORGÁSZ applikáció segítségével felfedezheted Magyarország horgászvizeit, horgászati és horgász turisztikai szolgáltatásait. A horgászvizekre online tudsz területi jegyet vásárolni.   

A HORGÁSZ applikáció legfontosabb funkciói induláskor:
•	Interaktív területi jegyvásárlás a közeledben lévő, illetve Magyarország bármely a HORINFO-ban elérhető több, mint 1000 vízterületére.
•	Horgász okmánytárca a rendelkezésedre álló horgászati jogosultságok digitalizált formában történő igazolására.
•	Állami horgászvizsga hiteles igazolása
•	Korlátozás alá vont területek és a saját pozíciód együttes megjelenítése térképes nézetben annak érdekében, hogy ne tévedj tilos vizekre.


A HORGÁSZ applikáció tervezett funkció bővítései hamarosan:
•	Elektronikus fogási napló
•	Hobbi fogások fényképes feltöltése
•	Kedvenc horgászhelyeid csak a számodra látható megjelölése és elmentése

developer: Nagy Sportagvalaszto, BBU Sportrendezveny Szervezo Iroda Nonprofit Korlatolt Felelossegu Tarsasag
description:
Mi is az a GeoGo virtuális sport program? A GeoGo teljesítések a teljesítménytúrákhoz hasonlíthatóak, azaz a túrákat meghatározott útvonalon, meghatározott szintidőn belül kell teljesíteni. Lényeges különbség, hogy a túrák nem rendezvényként kerülnek meghirdetésre, így egyénileg és csoportosan, de mégis igazoltan bármikor teljesíthetőek. A pályák között megtalálhatóak rövidebb séták és komoly kihívást jelentő útvonalak is.
Az alkalmazáshoz kapcsolódott az Ötpróba közössége is Ötpróba - Maradj Fitten elnevezésű programjával, ahol túrázás, futás, görkorcsolyázás, evezés, hegyi és országúti kerékpár sportágakban is gyűjthetők az Ötpróba pontok a GeoGo pályák segítségével.  
A globális járványhelyzet és az ebből fakadó korlátozások hatására többen tették le a voksukat a kirándulás és a futás mellett, mint valaha, hiszen ezek a sportok egyénileg és csoportosan, a szabadban is különösebb pénz- és időbefektetés nélkül biztonsággal végezhetőek, és segítenek abban, hogy télen-nyáron fittek maradjunk. A King's College London 2018-as felmérése szerint, amely több mint 2 ezer embert vizsgált, a különféle aktivitáskövető eszközök segítenek abban, hogy a szabadidő-sportolók motiváltak maradjanak a mélypontokon is. Szeretjük látni, hány kilométert mentünk, milyen szintet jártunk be és mennyi idő alatt értünk célba, és elégedettséggel tölti el az embereket, ha heti, havi, éves teljesítményüket bármikor vissza tudják keresni, össze tudják hasonlítani. 
A Nagy Sportágválasztó, BBU Nonprofit Kft., mint az Ötpróba sorozat koordinátora, a koronavírus-járvány következtében kialakult nehéz helyzetre a GeoGo alkalmazással reagált és továbbra is arra törekszik, hogy a több mint 30 ezer főt számláló szabadidő-sportolóit megfelelően kiszolgálja, ezáltal folyamatosan lehetőséget biztosítson a sportolásra és a pontgyűjtésre. Ezt a célt szem előtt tartva integrálta a GeoGo-t az Ötpróba programsorozatába, mint egy lehetőséget kínálva ezzel arra, hogy a közösség tagjai szabadon, rendezvényektől függetlenül, virtuálisan teljesíthessenek és akár 6 sportágban is pontokat szerezhessenek.
Az Ötpróba azonban több ennél: nem csak a számokban, statisztikákban és egészséges versenyben rejlő motivációt adja meg, hanem az embereket is közelebb hozza egymáshoz, hiszen a teljesítést a környékünkön élőkkel közösen is megszervezhetjük, így ismerkedésre, tapasztalatcserére, későbbi közös sportra is sor kerülhet. 
A teljesíthető útvonalak között rengeteg könnyű séta, néhány kilométeres túra is van, amit akár kirándulók vagy kisgyerekes családok is könnyedén teljesíthetnek, méghozzá a számukra leginkább kedvező időpontban, hiszen a GeoGo alkalmazás pontosan mutatja, mikor érnek a nevezők az adott ellenőrzőpontra, így nincs szükség a megszokott rendezvénykeretekre az útvonal teljesítéséhez. 
A program használatához nem kell más, csak egy okostelefon. A GeoGo oldalon egy gyors regisztráció után, valamint az Ötpróba azonosító megadásával már ki is lehet választani a leginkább tetsző útvonalat. Indulás előtt mindenképp szükséges ellenőrizni a helymeghatározás állapotát, mert ennek aktiválása nélkül nem indítható el a teljesítés. Ha ez rendben van, a program már mutatja is az aktuális helyzetünket és jelzi, hogy kezdődhet a teljesítés.
Az útvonalak között mindenki megtalálja az edzettségi állapotának megfelelőt a könnyen teljesíthető szinttől egészen az extreme kihívásokig, Magyarország szinte mindegyik régiójában.
Ha szeretnénk “Ötpróbázni”, egyszerű dolgunk van, az ingyenes regisztrációt követően letölthetjük a GeoGo-alkalmazást, ahol Ötpróba azonosítónk megadásával több, több száz díjmentes útvonal közül válogathatunk, hogy egész biztosan fittek maradjunk. Később pedig, ha ráéreztünk az egyénileg vagy csoportosan teljesített közösségi sport és persze a pontgyűjtés mámorító érzésére, már személyesen is próbálkozhatunk akár mind a 8 sportággal is a komolyabb, szintén pontot/pontokat adó Ötpróba naptárban szereplő „élő” rendezvényeken.

Stay closer to the beautiful Sports with LOLA FOOTBALL, the all-in-one app for live match updates, team stats, competition standings, and football news. Designed with a modern and intuitive interface, LOLA FOOTBALL ensures you never miss a moment – whether it’s a live score, upcoming fixture, player transfer or breaking story.

* LOLA FOOTBALL App Key Features *

Live Match Updates:
  • Follow matches in real time with instant scores, timelines, and in-game events.
  • Get updates on goals, substitutions, yellow/red cards and key highlights.

Fixtures & Results:

Competitions & Standings:
  • Explore a wide range of domestic leagues, international tournaments and regional cups.
  • Stay updated with live standings, points tables and rankings as the season unfolds.

Team & Player Details:
  • Browse complete team squads with player profiles, positions and stats.
  • View official line-ups and formations before kick-off.
  • Track injury reports and availability updates for each player.

Player & Match Statistics:
  • In-depth match data: shots, possession, fouls, offsides, corners and more.
  • Player stats including goals, assists, cards and rankings throughout the season.

Transfers & Market Updates:
  • Stay informed with the latest transfer activity, including player movements and fees.
  • Track free transfers, confirmed deals and squad changes.

Football Update News:
  • Read the latest football stories, headlines and updates directly within the app.
  • Get coverage on team announcements, player updates and tournament highlights.

Head-to-Head & Analysis:
  • Compare teams with H2H history: wins, draws, losses and previous results.
  • Analyze form and performance to anticipate future outcomes.

Season Highlights:
  • Relive the action with winner and runner-up summaries for completed seasons.
  • Access historical competition data in one place.

Stay connected with all the latest football action, match details, and news in one place! Hola Football Live app provides matches updates, match previews, live commentary, and in-depth stats for your favorite teams and matches across a variety of competitions. Whether you're following live matches scores, browsing team line-ups or checking standings, this app is designed to enhance your football experience.

Key Features of Hola Football Live App:

• Live Match Updates: Get all matches notifications and follow all the key moments from your favorite teams and competitions.
  
• Personalized Favorites: Add teams, matches, and leagues to your favorites for easy access to the latest updates and schedules.
  
• In-Depth Stats: Track player stats, assists, goals, yellow and red cards, and more. Monitor team performances across the season, from match results to top goal scorers and assists.

• Head-to-Head Comparisons: Analyze detailed team comparisons before each match, including historical performance data.
  
• Comprehensive Standings: Stay on top of your favorite leagues and competitions with up-to-date standings, filtered by home and away performance.
  
• Interactive Commentary: Follow live matche, play-by-play commentary that immerses you in the match, including key moments like goals, fouls, and substitutions.
  
• Upcoming Matches: Never miss a game with detailed schedules of upcoming fixtures. Whether it's your favorite team or a major event, you’ll know when and where the action is happening.

• News Feed: Stay up-to-date with the latest football news, transfers, and analysis, customized to your preferences. Get insights on potential player signings and major updates from your followed teams.
  
• Detailed Team Pages: View detailed profiles of your favorite teams, including recent matches, squad lists, and player statistics.

• Multi-League Coverage: Follow matches and standings across various leagues and competitions. Add leagues to your favorites for quick access to the most relevant action.

Hola Football Live app offers the perfect platform for football enthusiasts who want a one-stop app for match tracking, team updates, and engaging news content. With its sleek and easy-to-navigate interface, it’s never been easier to stay up-to-date with everything happening in the world of football.

Download Hola Football Live App Now and Elevate Your Football Experience!

Dear users, 

Because we want to accompany every athlete during their training, we have created the Domyos E Connected application.

Discover this new 100% free version which includes a number of new features! 

GOAL
On a regular basis, you will be asked to choose a goal to reach, whether it is a time, a distance to cover or calories to burn. To achieve these goals, several types of exercises are available.

PRACTICE
- Free sessions to start a session quickly with or without a goal.
- Guided sessions to reach your goals according to the different categories available.
- You can now create your own interval session!
The creation of this session is based on the principle of alternating intense and moderate efforts.
To do this, select a warm-up, then program the duration of each action and rest phase as well as the repetitions that will constitute your session.

PERFORMANCE
View your history and performance at any time in your profile.

FUN
The application takes control of the equipment while the athlete enjoys his favorite media on smartphone or tablet! (youtube, deezer, netflix...).
Discover what your practice data is like in real life!

Compatible with other services: 
The app allows you to sync with Apple Health / Google Fit
Link your accounts with Polar Flow, Fitbit, Garmin Health, Coros, Suunto via the application settings. 


Prerequisite: iOS 12.4 version minimum

If you have any questions or problems, please contact us via https://support.decathlon.co.uk/fitness-and-cardio-training
